name: Planted in a Cave
description:
A game where you navigate and travel underground tunnels, trying to nurse a mysterious plant that you encountered along the way. Every decision matters, and you never want to be alone in the dark.

This is my submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 (my first game jam). It could of course be a lot better. It might not be that fun but I tried ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

To play, download the .exe (.x86_64 for Linux users) as well as the .pck. Make sure they are in the same directory and run the executable.
